thread.title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Tina Johnson, Regional Director, Samsung Electronics America, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle

author: cbs8
title: National Association of Professional Women Inducts Tina Johnson, Regional Director, Samsung Electronics America, Into its VIP Professional Woman of the Year Circle
text:
Tina Johnson selected for her outstanding leadership and commitment within her profession
Garden City, NY (PRWEB) September 29, 2015
The National Association of Professional Women (NAPW) honors Tina Johnson as a 2015-2016 inductee into its VIP Woman of the Year Circle. She is recognized with this prestigious distinction for leadership in business. NAPW is the nation’s leading networking organization exclusively for professional women, boasting more than 700,000 members and over 200 operating Local Chapters.
“I’m pleased to welcome Tina into this exceptional group of professional women,” said NAPW President Star Jones. “Her knowledge and experience in her industry are valuable assets to her company and community.”
When Tina Johnson entered college as a pre-law major, she soon realized that marketing and information technology were of great interest to her.
“I studied Dale Carnegie, Zig Ziglar, Brian Tracy and Og Mandino among others and learned that influencing people in very positive and powerful ways was a skill that I wished to develop,” said Ms. Johnson.
Before Ms. Johnson knew it, a career in sales was born that would evolve over the course of 25-plus years in the high-paced mobile communications and technology industry. After spending 15 successful years at AT&T, she took on the role of Regional Director at Samsung Electronics America , the global leader in the Android mobility hardware space.
Ms. Johnson has been trained by the best global telecommunications company in the world in the areas of professional, strategic and consultative sales and account / relationship management. Aside from drive for personal growth and success in every facet of her professional and personal life, she credits her career success to her spiritual walk.
“My faith has enabled me to recognize opportunity and take risks both professionally and personally that have allowed me to consistently grow and improve in multiple areas of my life,” she said.
Awards & Accomplishments: Bachelor’s, Florida State University, International Business Marketing and Foreign Language
LinkedIn
About NAPW
NAPW’s mission is to provide an exclusive, highly advanced networking forum to successful women executives, professionals and entrepreneurs where they can aspire, connect and achieve. Through innovative resources, unique tools and progressive benefits, professional women interact, exchange ideas, advance their knowledge and empower each other.
